long_description: A bike built for dedicated BMXers, the Diamondback Session 24 in. bike offers the durability of a steel frame and fork with the stability of 24 in. wheels. Steel frame offers the strength to handle the rigors of BMX freestyle biking. Strong 3-piece tubular chromoly crankset drives a 39-tooth chain ring to a 16-tooth cassette for very quick acceleration. Single-speed drivetrain offers simplicity and low maintenance. Linear-pull rear brake provides stopping power when needed. Stout BMX 24 in. wheels are outfitted with Kenda K-Rad tires for all-around performance. Specs on the Diamondback Session AM 24 in. bike are subject to change.
short_description: A bike built for dedicated BMXers, the Diamondback Session 24 in. bike offers the durability of a steel frame and fork with the stability of 24 in. wheels.
